name: Totally Normal Corridor
description:
A game made in 3 days

Try to find the secret juice, you will get bragging rights

Some jumps are difficult, but all are possible.

Average playtime: 17:30

haha long boi levels go brrrr

Themes used: Corridor, Glitch, Meme.

Controls: Space to jump, left and right to move, up to climb.
